comment:
>>44288515

Salvage, boys.

You're falling towards Kjorikos at high speed, two-handing a bastard sword shielded by concussive force. If only the ground were breakable—then you'd have a home field advantage. And, hey, who's to say it isn't? You'll work on your swing for next time, or maybe invest in a hammer.

Either way, you love it when a plan comes together. He's tangled up in the combat below, not taking much damage. But he doesn't need to; it was, after all, a distraction. He turns upward to face you, preparing a lightning bolt all too late. Instead, he pulls away, levitating himself not-quite out of reach of your swing. At the touch of your blade, he's buffeted with immense force, and sent all the way to the ground, crashing down on one hand and one knee hard enough to flatten the grass in a six foot radius.

> [[ HP: 29 / 35 ]]
> [[ PP: 4 / 8 ]]

You're caught off-guard by the sparks that rocket along your blade—a reactive attack. You don't let it deter you as your PP begins to regenerate.

> [[ Continued ]]
name: Sylvetica
